job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Position: Data Scientist
Work Location: Seattle Washington 98109
Duration: 12 Months Contract
Onsite role


BS degree with 4+ years of experience, a M.Sc. degree with 2+ years of experience or a recent PhD in Statistics, Biostatistics, Computer Science, Bioinformatics or similar fields.
Experience with APIs, or ability to quickly learn how to use them (e.g. R httr or Python requests)
Experienced in data visualization and analytics
